titleInfo.title: True Love Is Greater Than Friendship - Johnny Cash performance - 1970

mods.abstract: Performance of True Love Is Greater Than Friendship, as performed by Johnny Cash and Carl Perkins and published by Cedarwood Publishing Company. Featured on the soundtrack for the movie "Little Fauss And Big Halsy," released in 1970.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
